Example

Class OddEven

  • java.lang.Object
    • Example.Process
      • Example.OddEven
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Prime

    public class OddEven
extends Process
    Find odd and even integer finder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OddEven()
      Basic constructor that defaults to modulus check
      OddEven(boolean useBitCheck)
      Basic constructor that switches between using a bit shift check, which only works with integers, but this example will only use integers at this time.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void check(int value)
      Implement abstract function from base class.
      protected boolean isValueEven(int value)
      Check even odd
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Check to see if the integers passed in are even or odd using both the modulus and bit check method

        doCheck

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • OddEven

        public OddEven(boolean useBitCheck)
        Basic constructor that switches between using a bit shift check, which only works with integers, but this example will only use integers at this time.
        Parameters:
        useBitCheck - Defaults to false, when true bit shift used instead of modulous

        Basic constructor that defaults to modulus check

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Check to see if the integers passed in are even or odd using both the modulus and bit check method

        Implement abstract function from base class. Will check even/odd.

        Check even odd
